title: Derank shield?
body:
I've lost 34 games basically in a row with a few wins here and there on bronze 4 0 lp, however I have failed to derank. 
Any clue as to why this is happening?
Really don't want to derank but i think its coming

replies.body: You're blocked from deranking in lower ranks, but if you lose enough games, you'll get a warning that you're within a few of games of de-ranking if you don't win.

To hazard a guess; because the rank system is fucked, and you are a Bronze with the ambition of an Iron IV and the MMR of a Plat II.

It goes the other way, if your MMR is absurdly different from your rank, you can skip entire divisions.
Cuz you're a BEAST. Keep grinding get silver before the season ends!
